decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
Condition : 2 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extensions hereby permitted shall match those used in the original building.

Condition : 3 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (Location Plan, M/455/01, M/455/02 and M/455/03 received on 22/01/2016) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.

Condition : 4 - No additional windows or other glazed openings shall be formed in the side walls of the extensions hereby approved and no additional doors inserted in the building without the prior written consent of the Local Planning Authority.
Condition : 5 - The extensions hereby permitted shall not be occupied at any time other than for purposes ancillary to the residential use of the dwelling known as 41 Helen Avenue.

Condition : 6 - Prior to the first beneficial occupation of the side extensions hereby approved the existing vehicular access to Helen Avenue shall be closed and the footway reinstated so that it cannot be used as an access across the pavement. At that time the front boundary wall shall also be reinstated to match that which exists except at the point of pedestrian access, and all these alterations shall be so maintained at all times thereafter.
description: Erection of a single storey side extension, conversion of the existing car port to a habitable room and the erection of a pitched roof over existing two side extension
